title: My Porfolio (this site)
content: Many of my other projects almost entirely utilitarian. Here I put a lot more work into the styling.
Of particular note is how responsize the layout is. Try resizing the window and see for yourself.
It's designed to function and look good down to a width of 400 pixels.
In addition, all of my content is stored as JSON and is being pulled into the app via a graphql query.
Image processing is handled by gatsby-image, which manages the compression and blur effect upon load.
